Item 8.01 - Other Events.content: On May 31, 2022, Meta Platforms, Inc. issued a press release announcing that its Class A common stock will begin trading on The Nasdaq Global Select Market under the new ticker symbol 'META' prior to market open on June 9, 2022. A copy of the press release is attached hereto as Exhibit 99.1 and is incorporated herein by reference.
